name: Turkey Shoot
description:
Hello everyone, this game was a fun little prototype that was specifically made for a Game Jam at my university. It was a quick Game Jam that had a turkey based theme. In honor of Thanksgiving, I made a turkey shoot game. It is very simple and mainly made for laughs. I hope everyone likes it and feedback is always welcomed. Happy ThanksGiving Everyone!

Credit: Only one person worked on this game. I did the artwork and design. I used Stencyl as the software for the game design, and I also used a template from Stencyl to base my game on.
